comments.to_install:
npm install --save-dev onchange@3.3.0
                   npm install parallelshell@3.0.2
                   npm install -g less@2.7.2(sudo)
                   npm install --save-dev node-sass@4.7.2
                   npm install --save-dev rimraf@2.6.2
                   npm -g install copyfiles@2.0.0(sudo)
                   npm -g install imagemin-cli@3.0.0(sudo)

to_scripts.usemin:
usemin contactus.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/contactus.html &&
